description: Each row in this table contains information related to a user marking a pathway as reviewed in the pathway review activity.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the pathway record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REVIEWED_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user who marked the pathway as reviewed. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: REVIEWED_AT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the pathway was marked as reviewed.

columns.name: REVIEWED_COMMENT
columns.description: An optional comment that can be entered when marking a pathway as reviewed.
